definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 ding4 wei4 xi4 tong3
huan2 qiu2 ding4 wei4 xi4 tong3
tong3 yi1 zi1 yuan2 ding4 wei4
tong3 yi1 zi1 yuan2 ding4 wei4 fu2

definition: sonic location system (esp. underwater sonar)/acoustic positioning

pinyin: wei4 xing1 ding4 wei4 xi4 tong3

sentences.english: Therefore, the dissertation concentrates on the research of localization in WSNs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，本論文圍繞無線傳感器網絡定位技術展開研究。

sentences.english: Research on DGPS positioning accuracy under the tree canopy in forest land.
sentences.chinese: DGPS在林區及林冠下的定位精度分析。

sentences.english: The method based on region connectivity analysis and matched template for locating of news video caption.
sentences.chinese: 新聞視頻字幕定位的連通域法及模板匹配法。

sentences.english: All sub-assemblies can be oriented in direction as required by the customer.
sentences.chinese: 所有子配件均可按用戶要求的方向進行定位。

sentences.english: Middle and high-end landscape design is required to comply with its commercial orientation.
sentences.chinese: 設計以中高端的景觀環境來匹配其商業定位。

sentences.english: A true friend stabs you in the front.
sentences.chinese: 真朋儕纔會當面中傷定位。

sentences.english: Optical Localizer have the very high accuracy and reliability, but very expensive.
sentences.chinese: 光學立體定位儀精度高，可靠性強，但是價格昂貴。

sentences.english: Whales and dolphins rely on their responsive hearing to interpret returning echolocation clicks.
sentences.chinese: 鯨魚和海豚靠回聲定位系統來辨別方向。

sentences.english: The flexible dolly bar can effectively adjust the film space, and perform the accurate orientation.
sentences.chinese: 靈活的調節杆，能快速有效地調整膜距，正確定位。

sentences.english: The method of noise source identification and location based on Wave Superposition Method(WSM) is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基於波疊加的噪聲源識別和定位方法。

sentences.english: Mooring positioning system is one of the key technologies of the semi-submersible drilling platform.
sentences.chinese: 錨泊定位系統是半潛式平臺關鍵技術之一。

sentences.english: The cross location is the uppermost location mode for the ship-borne microwave OTH radar.
sentences.chinese: 交叉定位是艦載微波超視距雷達最主要的定位方式。

sentences.english: The cross location is the uppermost location mode for the ship-borne microwave OTH radar.
sentences.chinese: 交叉定位是艦載微波超視距雷達最主要的定位方式。

sentences.english: We want a radar position during dumping. Please cover us on your radar.
sentences.chinese: 放油時我們需要雷達定位，請在雷達中觀察我們。

sentences.english: Saab’s ARTHUR radar system locates incoming enemy projectiles and missiles.
sentences.chinese: ARTHUR雷達系統可定位敵方來襲炮彈和導彈。

sentences.english: First of all, the teaching target needs to be corrected and reoriented .
sentences.chinese: 首先，要修正教學目標，要重新定位，還原魯迅。

definition: to compare a product with (a rival product)/to benchmark against (another product)
to create/to build/to develop/to forge (of metal)
